attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament NOW To Allow Voters To Sack Crooked MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dissolve parliament now to allow voters the opportunity to sack all rotten MPs identified as milking expenses to their own benefit as none seem decent enough to resign themselves.

It is obvious, from the request for the Police to find out who 'leaked' the information on expenses, that Parliament still wants this covered up.

Rotten to the core !!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
